OOC: That optical lazar blast should have  done some damage to him. 
At least burn a small hole in his shoulder. Her optical lazars are a 
fairly decent weapon. He shouldn't be able to just shrug it off.
Since this isn't a fight of great importance, don't repost but 
remember it for next time.Incase they have to fight side by side. 

KitKat::

She felt him hit her jaw. Her head whipped back. She was barly awake. 
But she wouldn't give in. She growled at him again. "Is that the best 
you have you slag for brains?" Mech fluid was leaking from the corner 
of her jaw. She raised her hand again and back handed him in the face.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> Perceptor punch her jaw in order to knok her out and end this 
> annoyed argument.
